BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L30' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L30' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L30' THEN RGLR_SPP_OBJ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_RSG_BOR_AMT /*(홈케어)멥버십 - 없는 값 SPAY_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L70' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L70' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_DLQ_ADD_AMT , AND NW_YN = #{nwYn} /* 신규구분 */

SELECT T1.BASE_YM , T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /* 집금 담당자 번호 */ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE PRTNR_NO = T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO) AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_KNM /* 집금 담당자명 */ , '' AS LSTMM_CLCTAM_DV_CD /* 전월 담당집금구분 */ , (SELECT FIRST_VALUE(CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO) OVER(ORDER BY BASE_YM DESC) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T2 WHERE T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN) AS LSTMM_CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /* 전월 담당자 번호 */ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE PRTNR_NO = (SELECT FIRST_VALUE(CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO) OVER(ORDER BY BASE_YM DESC) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T2 WHERE T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN) ) AS LSTMM_CLCTAM_PRTNR_KNM /* 전월담당자 */ , T1.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T3.CST_KNM /* 고객명 */ , T1.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , '' AS PD_DV_CD /* 상품구분 (미정-상품테이블 봐야함) */ , T1.DLQ_MCN /* 연체개월 */ , (T1.DLQ_AMT + T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT) AS OBJ_AMT /* 대상금액 */ , T1.DLQ_AMT /* 연체금액 */ , T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT /* 당월금액 */ , T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT /* 연체가산금액 */ , T1.RSG_BOR_AMT /* 위약금액 */ , T2.LWM_TP_CD /* 법조치유형 */ , T2.LWM_DTL_TP_CD /* 법조치상세 */ , T2.LWM_DT /* 법조치일자 */ , T2.DFLT_DT /* 채불등록일자 */ , T4.BAS_ADR||T4.DTL_ADR AS ADDR /* 주소 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_BND_LWM_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_NO = T2.CST_NO AND T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CST_NO = T2.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T3 ON T1.CST_NO = T3.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_CTPLC_BAS T4 ON T3.ADR_ID = T4.ADR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD = #{bzHdqDvCd} AND T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = #{clctamDvCd} AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '02' /* 연체 상태의 채권만 대상 */ AND T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO = #{clctamPrtnrNo} ORDER BY T1.FST_RGST_DTM DESC
